headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROBINSON, BERTRAM, 94, MONROE TWP.

snippet: ROBINSON--Bertram, 94, Monroe Twp.,NJ, on June 28, 2016. Retired Commercial Real Estate Developer. Husband of the late Phoebe Robinson. Father of Marc and the late Barbara Robinson. Father-in-law of Donna Rosenstein. Grandfather of Zachary and Georgi. Brother of Sandra Linzer. To leave condolences, please visit: www.msmc.us 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROBINSON--Bertram, 94, Monroe Twp.,NJ, on June 28, 2016. Retired Commercial Real Estate Developer. Husband of the late Phoebe Robinson. Father of Marc and the late Barbara Robinson.
